reviewText:
This, surprisingly, is one of the better Hot Body features I've seen. It combines gorgeous babes, some scenarios and great "shots" to make it a great sexy video for a lonely night.

1) The production - Standard Hot Body, good locales & production, lighting shows you what you want to see. As always, too much dumb narration.

2) The action - Nothing new but very hot. Busty Tanya Danielle and Bambi working out in a (makeshift) gym; hot Mason Marconi and a smoking brunette stripping each other and trading nude lapdances. Nice stripping and sexy hot.

3) The girls - Awesome - Tanya (unbelievable body) and Mason are fantastic. Most of the babes are cute and nicely busty, some really stacked - Eva Major stands out as a stunning blonde seductress. But ultimately, it was Karissa (on the cover) that "blew me away" so to speak, w/ her huge top, long legs and swiveling hips.

4) Pink Factor - Stellar - some great, lingering close-ups and girls that knew what the audience wanted. Only one girl in the whole video played the "hide the prize" game. Awesome spreads, front & rear. Nice. Highlights were Tanya (unbelievable but too brief), Karissa & a tall, lean, young brunette on a bed.

As always, if you're into hot chicks in stripping vignettes, HBI is the holy grail. This one is definitely worth the price of admission.
